title: Salmon and bulgur wheat pilaf
description: Bulgur wheat is healthy and filling and a nice alternative to rice or couscous. This salmon pilaf flavoured with fresh herbs is a healthy quick supper. This meal is low calorie and provides 461 kcal, 32g protein, 49g carbohydrate (of which 1.7g sugars), 14.6g fat (of which 2.4g saturates), 2.5g fibre and 0.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
